rdfs:label: is systematic monitoring
dc:description: Indicates whether the processing comprises of systematic monitoring of data subjects or their personal data

rdfs:label: is evaluation scoring
dc:description: Indicates whether the processing ir part of or results in evaluation or scoring of an individual or their personal data

rdfs:label: is matching combining
dc:description: Indicates whether the processing comprises of matching or combining existing data
rdfs:comment: originating from two or more data processing operations performed for different purposes and/or by different data controllers in a way that would exceed the reasonable expectations of the data subject (WP29 Opinion on Purpose limitation 13/EN WP 203, p.24).  For instance Integration/Enrichment with other data (not necessarily personal only)

rdfs:label: is automated decision making
dc:description: Indicates whether the processing comprises of or is part of or results in automated decision making

rdfs:label: is large scale
dc:description: Indicates the processing is carried out at large scale in terms of size of data or individuals associated

rdfs:label: innovative use of new solutions
dc:description: Indicates the processing comprises of innovative uses of new or radical solutions
rdfs:comment: e.g. combining fingerprint & face scan for access control. What is concidered new/innovative is of course subject to change over time.

rdfs:label: Acquire
dc:description: to come into possession or control of the data

rdfs:label: Adapt
dc:description: to modify the data, often rewritten into a new form for a new use

rdfs:label: Align
dc:description: to adjust the data to be in relation to another data

rdfs:label: Alter
dc:description: to change the data withouth changing it into something else

rdfs:label: Analyse
dc:description: to study or examine the data in detail

rdfs:label: Anonymise
dc:description: to irreversibly alter personal data in such a way that a unique data subject can no longer be identified directly or indirectly or in combination with other data

rdfs:label: Collect
dc:description: to gather data from someone

rdfs:label: Combine
dc:description: to join or merge data

rdfs:label: Consult
dc:description: to consult or query data

rdfs:label: Copy
dc:description: to produce an exact reprodution of the data

rdfs:label: Derive
dc:description: to create new derivative data from the original data

rdfs:label: Destruct
dc:description: to process data in a way it no longer exists or cannot be repaired

rdfs:label: Disclose
dc:description: to make data known

rdfs:label: Disclose by Transmission
dc:description: to disclose data by means of transmission

rdfs:label: Disseminate
dc:description: to spread data throughout

rdfs:label: Erase
dc:description: to delete data

rdfs:label: Make Available
dc:description: to transform or publish data to be used

rdfs:label: Move
dc:description: to move data from one location to another including deleting the original copy

rdfs:label: Obtain
dc:description: to solicit or gather data from someone

rdfs:label: Organise
dc:description: to organize data for arranging or classifying

rdfs:label: Profiling
dc:description: to create a profile that describes or represents a person

rdfs:label: Pseudo-Anonymise
dc:description: to replace personal identifiable information by artificial identifiers

rdfs:label: Record
dc:description: to make a record (especially media)

rdfs:label: Remove
dc:description: to destruct or erase data

rdfs:label: Restrict
dc:description: to apply a restriction on the processsing of specific records

rdfs:label: Retrieve
dc:description: to retrieve data, often in an automated manner

rdfs:label: Share
dc:description: to give data (or a portion of it) to others

rdfs:label: Store
dc:description: to keep data for future use

rdfs:label: Structure
dc:description: to arrange data according to a structure

rdfs:label: Transfer
dc:description: to move data from one place to another

rdfs:label: Transform
dc:description: to change the form or nature of data

rdfs:label: Transmit
dc:description: to send out data

rdfs:label: Use
dc:description: to use data
